messages.title: Julian Huppert: A strong, independent voice
messages.content: Julian Huppert is a former research scientist and has been an independently-minded MP with a strong record of putting local people first.

messages.title: Your Choice: Julian Huppert – A strong, independent voice OR Ed Miliband’s Man: Just another suit for Labour

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Julian secured an extra £23.2 million in funding each year for local schools. He also delivered £9 million in funding to increase school capacity.
The Lib Dems will deliver the extra £8bn the NHS Chief Executive said it needed to secure its long-term future.
Julian fought for millions of pounds of investment into our city through the 'City Deal.'
Julian secured vital extra funding for our local schools and hospitals.

mentions.candidate: Julian Huppert will ALWAYS put Cambridge First.

issues.education: Julian fought for millions of pounds of investment into our city through the 'City Deal.'
issues.health: The Lib Dems will deliver the extra £8bn the NHS Chief Executive said it needed to secure its long-term future.

leaflet.personalStatement: Julian Huppert: A strong, independent voice

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured an extra £23.2 million in funding each year for our local schools. Delivered £9 million in funding to increase school capacity. Secured vital extra funding for our local schools and hospitals.

images.caption: Julian Huppert with a family, the child holding a sign saying 'Well worth a read! -Sx'

leaflet.additionalNotes: Julian voted against his party’s plans when they would hurt Cambridge. He said NO to student tuition hikes, military intervention in Iraq and Syria, and controversial NHS reforms.
